name: stoked-sparksurfer
flavor_text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu,
attacks the target with full force. This move leaves
the target with paralysis.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect_text_simple: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
